title: United Nations Declaration on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples
description: To provide support for Colorado Law's annual conference to implement the UN Declaration on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples, including travel, lodging, meals for luminaries and attendees, honorariums, printed materials and event costs.
